activeDaysDescription.message: Set the days during which StayFocusd will restrict your browsing activity.

activeHoursDescription.message: Set the hours during which StayFocusd will restrict your browsing activity. These hours will apply to all Active Days.

allSitesBlockedImmediately.message:
The time you entered is less than the amount of time you have remaining for today. That means all sites on your Blocked Sites list will be blocked immediately.

Are you sure you want to do this?

areYouSure.description: Are you sure you want to confirm these settings?
areYouSure.message: Are you sure you want to do this?

areYouSureClearWhitelist.message: Are you sure you want to clear the list of allowed sites?

areYouSureDeleteGroup.message: Are you sure you want to delete a blocked group $groupname$?

areYouSureShareLimit.message: Synced usage limits consider the overall usage in your paired devices. Do you want to sync this limit across paired devices?

askBirthYearTitle.message: Quick question to help us know more about our userbase...

beWarnedRequireChallenge.message: BE WARNED: If you enter something really long and difficult, you will have to complete the challenge with that text before you can change it.

birthYearErrorsLength.message: Enter all 4 digits of your birth year

blockAllwebsitesDescription.message: Block all websites except the ones in Allowed Sites list

blockExtensionPage1.message: Want to stop yourself from disabling StayFocusd?

blockNewTab1.message: To block opening a new tab

blockNotification.message: StayFocusd will start blocking your Blocked Sites in

blockStayFocusdPage1.message: Want to prevent yourself from changing StayFocusd settings?

blockedSitesHeader.message: You are given a certain amount of time each day for a group of websites. After your time has ran out for a group, you will not be able to access any of that group’s websites during the active days & hours until the daily reset time.

cannotAddAllowedSitesDuringNuclearOption.message: You cannot add sites to the Allowed Sites list while the Nuclear Option is active.

cannotBlockStayFocusd.message: Sorry! You cannot add stayfocusd.com to the Blocked Sites list.

cannotRemoveBlockedSiteDuringNuclearOpti.message: You cannot remove Blocked Sites while the Nuclear Option is active.

cannotSetMoreThan1440Mins.message: You cannot set the Maximum Time Allowed to more than 1,440 minutes (which is 24 hours).

cannotSetTimeToZero.message: You cannot set the Maximum Time Allowed to zero.

cannotSetTimeToZeroOrLess.message: You cannot set the Maximum Time Allowed to zero or less than zero.

cannotTurnOfExtensionToday.message: You cannot turn the extension off for the current day.

challengeModalDescription1.message: In order to change your settings, you'll have to pass this challenge first. You must re-type the paragraph below, letter for letter,

challengeModalDescription3.message: If you make a typo, or hit the backspace or delete key, everything you typed will be cleared, and you'll have to start again.

challengeTextTooShort.message: Sorry, your challenge text must be at least as long as the default challenge ($1 characters)

changindActiveHours.message: If you change your Active Hours, the new hours will not take effect until this time tomorrow (24 hours from now)

changindDailyResetTime.message: If you change your Daily Reset Time, the new time will not take effect until this time tomorrow (24 hours from now)

clickToEnable.message: Click the button to enable it

customMsgSaved.message: Your custom redirect message has been saved.

dailyResetTimeAfterActiveHours.message: Make sure to set your Daily Reset Time to a time after the end of your Active Hours.

dailyResetTimeDescription.message: Set the time at which StayFocusd will reset your allowed time for the day.

dataCollectionConfirmMessage.message: Opting out of data collection will disable some features.

daysInActiveDaysTab.message: Only on days checked in the Active Days tab

declineToSMessage.message: You must accept the Terms of Service to use StayFocusd.

defaultRequireChallengeText.message: The procrastinator is often remarkably optimistic about his ability to complete a task on a tight deadline; this is usually accompanied by expressions of reassurance that everything is under control. (Therefore, there is no need to start.) Lulled by a false sense of security, time passes. At some point, he crosses over an imaginary starting time and suddenly realizes, "Oh no! I am not in control! There isn't enough time!"

disableExtension1.message:
Wait, what? You're not seriously thinking about disabling me, are you? 

Think of all the productivity we've achieved together. Click CANCEL to keep the magic alive.

disableExtension2.message:
Disabling me won't solve your problems. It's like ignoring a wise friend who only wants the best for you. 

Are you sure you want to go down this path?

disableExtension3.message:
This is getting serious. You're about to abandon your commitment to less procrastination. 

Do you really want to throw away all your progress for a moment of weakness?

disableExtension4.message: You clicked OK again? I'm starting to think you don't value our time together.

disableExtension5.message:
This is heartbreaking. The button you are about to press might also erase the happiest memories of your productive times. 

Can you live with that guilt?

disableExtension6.message: Still here? Still clicking? You're a tough cookie, but seriously, think about the puppies.

disableExtension7.message:
Last chance. After this, there's no turning back. Remember, every time someone disables me, a fairy loses its wings. 

Do you really want to be that person?

disableExtension8.message:
Alright, if you must. But know that somewhere, a unicorn sheds a single tear. 

Proceed with your decision, but remember: I warned you.

disableFinalWarning.message:
This is it. The final step. If you go through with this, you're on your own. 

But hey, if you ever change your mind, I'll be here... waiting... silently judging... but waiting.

enableRequireChallenge.message: Yes, I want to be challenged before being allowed to change any settings (including this one).

enterChallengeText.message: Enter custom text to be used in the challenge (min 425 chars).

exportSettingsDescription.message: You can export your settings as a backup, or to transfer them to another computer. You'll be prompted to save a .json file. Just click Save, and you're done.

extDescription.message: Boost your productivity by limiting the amount of time you spend on time-wasting websites.

extName.message: StayFocusd - Block Distracting Websites & Web Analytics

extensionDisabled.message: The extension is now disabled. Don't say I didn't warn you. The path to procrastination is wide open.

givingLessTime.description: The user has made his settings more strict, so we want to congratulate him.
givingLessTime.message:
You're giving yourself LESS time?

*slow clap*

Well played, my friend.

groupIsAlreadyUse.message: This group name is already in use, choose a different name

haveAlreadyAddedAllowedWebsites.message: You have already added this website to your allowed sites list

haveAlreadyAddedWebsites.message:
You have already added this website to a blocked site group. 
$1

hideAllowLinks.message: Hide all links in popup which let you allow sites (i.e. "Allow this entire site", "Allow custom url", etc.)

hideSwitchDescription.message: When you urgently need to get to blocked pages, you can easily disable and enable the StayFocusd extension using the toggle switches.

hideSwitchDisabled.message: If hiding the switch was previously selected, you can't make it visible again when The Nuclear Option is active or when the allowed time has expired for any blocked group.

howToPair.message: How to pair StayFree with StayFocusd?

importEmailSupport1.message: If that's what you did and you're still getting this error, please email

importEmailSupport2.message: and attach the settings file you're trying to import.

importSettingsDescription.message: If you previously exported your settings, click the Choose File button, locate the .json file, then click Import Settings.

importingSettingsOverwrite2.message: any existing settings. There is no way to undo this.

inAppBlocking_tiktok_blackWhiteModeDescr.message: Use only black and white colors for any TikTok pages

inAppBlocking_tiktok_description.message: Block specific TikTok features like comments, explore or more.

inAppBlocking_youtube_blackWhiteModeDesc.message: Use only black and white colors for any YouTube pages

inAppBlocking_youtube_description.message: Block specific YouTube features like shorts, comments, or more.

inAppBlocking_youtube_disableEndCardsDes.message: Hide video recommendations shown in the player at the end of videos

inAppBlocking_youtube_disabledAutoPlayDe.message: Disabling autoplaying the next video at the end of the previous video

inAppBlocking_youtube_hideTopBarDescript.message: Hide the top bar including search box

initActiveHoursMsg.message: Starting at $1, your Active Hours will be from $2 to $3

initResetTimeMsg.message: Starting at $1 your Daily Reset Time will be $2

installStayFree.message: Install StayFree from $stayfreeWebsite$ and pair it with StayFocusd for a seamless experience.

lessThanThreeMins.message:
There are less than three minutes left before your time runs out. You're not trying to cheat, are you?

If you still want to update your settings, click OK.

lessThanThreeMins2.message:
Seriously, the whole point of this extension is that you're not supposed to give yourself extra time.

Are you sure you want to do this?

lessThanThreeMins3.message:
Look, this isn't working out. I can't help but feel like you're not committed to this relationship.

Are you really willing to risk our friendship just for a few more minutes of web browsing?

lessThanThreeMins4.message: I can't believe you clicked OK.

lessThanThreeMins5.message: This is why we can't have nice things.

lessThanThreeMins6.message: You're really going to go through with this, aren't you?

lessThanThreeMins8.message:
Okay, well ... I did my best. But before I change your settings, there's something you should know:

There's a slight chance that maybe, possibly, the OK button will start a global thermonuclear war.

Also, it may electrocute a puppy.

There are no guarantees, but it could happen. I just thought you should know.

Go ahead. Click away.

madeAMistake.message:
D'oh! You made a mistake.

Do you really need to change these settings, or are you just trying to cheat? Be honest.

Either way, you'll have to start over.

maybeYouShouldReconsider.message:
You're trying to give yourself more time? You sure that's a good idea? Maybe you should reconsider.

Are you sure you want to increase the maximum time allowed?

meow.description: The user just clicked a button that warned him that clicking it would electrocute a kitten.

mustSelectSettingsFile.message: You must select a settings file to import. Click the Choose File to select a file.

noChartData.message: No data available. Try another date or change filters

notEnoughVariation.message: Hmmm. Your challenge text has suspiciously little variation in characters. You'll have to use something more challenging.

notShareLimitAcrossDevicesDescription.message: This limit only considers usage on the current device.

notificationsDescription.message: Set up to five times you want to be warned before time runs out or before the Nuclear Option kicks in (both use the same settings). To disable notifications, leave all fields blank.

nuclearDescription.message: Activating this option will block sites for the number of hours you indicate, on the days you indicate, independent of your Active Hours. There is no way to cancel this once you activate it.

nuclearDescriptionWarning.message: "All websites" includes web-based email, Google, online banking, local files (file:// urls) and other sites which you may not realize you need until it's too late.

nuclearIsActiveUntil.message: The Nuclear Option is active until $1

nuclearOptionWillBeStart.message: The nuclear option will be launched

nuclear_blockedType_AllExceptAllowed.message: Websites EXCEPT those on my Allowed Sites list

nuclear_blockedType_BlockedSites.message: ONLY websites on my Blocked Sites list

nuclear_commencingNuclearOption.message: Commencing Nuclear Option. May God have mercy on your soul.

nuclear_maxTimeHasBeenExceeded.message: Your Max Time Allowed for today has already been exceeded, so

nuclear_nuclearOptionImmediately.message: the Nuclear Option will go into effect immediately.

nuclear_onActiveDays.message: on the days you selected in the Active Days tab

nuclear_selectedTimeHasPassed.message: Your selected time has already passed, so

nuclear_smartBombMultimedia_Logins_descr.message: (Blocks password fields so you can't log into sites requiring login)

nuclear_smartBombMultimedia_Multimedia_d.message: (Flash games, video players, music players, etc)

nuclear_startTime_MaxTimeAllowedExceeded.message: When my Max Time Allowed has been exceeded

nuclear_whatBlock.message: What do you want to block?

nuclear_whichSites.message: Which sites do you want to block?

numberOfKeysDoesNotMatch.message:
Uh oh. The number of keys you hit doesn't match the number of characters in the text box.

Some cut-and-paste trickery, perhaps? Pretty sneaky, sis.

You'll have to start over.

onboardingConfirmMessage.message: If you do not accept the Privacy Policy, some upcoming features will not be available.

onboardingConfirmTitle.message: Get the most out of StayFocusd

onboardingNewUserMessage.message: StayFocusd is the best tool for staying productive. Accept our Terms of Service to get started.

onlyHurtingYourself.message:
Seriously, dude. The whole point of this extension is to stop you from procrastinating.

You're only hurting yourself.

And the kitten that gets an electric shock every time you click OK.

Are you sure you can live with yourself?

pairStep1.message: Visit $stayfreeWebsite$ and install StayFree app on your mobile device or your computer.

pairStep2.message: Open the newly installed StayFree app.

pairStep3.message: Go to "Settings" and click "Pair New Device".

pairStep5.message: Copy your 6-digit pairing code from the box below and paste it into the input field.

pairingPromo_trackAcrossAllDevices.message: Track your screen time across all devices.

pairing_success.message: You're connected! You can now view the usage for all your paired devices

privatePolicyProps1.message: We do not want to know who you are

privatePolicyProps2.message: We de-identify any information we collect

privatePolicyProps3.message: We never sell any collected information to third parties

privatePolicyProps4.message: We purposefully avoid and never intentionally handle sensitive data

privatePolicyProps5.message: We use anonymized information to further develop StayFocusd and Sensor Tower products and services

problemImportingSettings.message: There was a problem importing your settings.

redirectMessageDescription.message: When StayFocusd blocks a site, it redirects to stayfocusd.com with the message "Shouldn't you be working?" You can replace that message with a custom message of your own.

removeDeviceConfirmationMessage.message: Removing this device will not delete any usage data, you just won't be able to see it's usage from the other devices anymore.

removeSitesAtAnyTime.message: You can remove sites from the Allowed Sites list at any time, regardless of whether your time has expired.

removeSitesDescription2.message: to remove a site from the list.

requireChallengeDescription.message: If this option is selected, you will be required to complete a difficult -- but not impossible -- challenge before you are allowed to change any settings. This makes it inconvenient for you to change settings, therefore reducing the chances that you'll cheat.

requireChallengeTextHasBeenSet.message: Your challenge text has been set.

setUpCall.message: Or, set up a call to chat with us.

settingICanBeMoreProductive.message: settings so I can be more productive

shareLimitAcrossDevices.message: Share the limit across paired devices

shareLimitAcrossDevicesDescription.message: This limit considers the usage on all paired devices.

showAdCountDescription.message: The number of distractions you have had from these blocked websites

spentTimeOnBlockedSites.message: Here's how you spent time on blocked sites:

stayFreePairingDescription.message: StayFocusd is now part of the $stayfree$!

stayFreePairingFeatures.message: Connect StayFocusd with StayFree on your mobile or desktop to $features$.

features.content: sync your screen time, set cross-device usage limits, and track your digital habits—all in one place

stayfreePairingPromoDescription.message: Install StayFree apps on your mobile phone or your computer from $stayfreeWebsite$ and pair with StayFocusd to set cross-device usage limits and track your screen time in a single dashboard!

stayfreePairingPromoTitle.message: StayFocusd now pairs with StayFree apps!

syncOptionDescription.message: By default, StayFocusd will sync your Blocked Sites and Allowed Sites between all your devices via Chrome Sync. Click the box below to turn this feature off.

timeExpiredCannotChangeUntilTomorrow.message: Your time for today has expired. You cannot change these settings until tomorrow.

timeExpiredForGroup.message: $groupName$’s time limit has expired for today. You can’t apply any changes to this group until tomorrow. Blocked sites can't be removed but you can still add new blocked sites anytime you want.

tosHaveChanged.message: Our Terms of Service have changed. Open the settings page to accept them.

trackTabsPlayingAudioDescription.message: Track tabs that play audio or video in the background in your daily usage.

under18Message.message: StayFocusd can be used if you are under 18! Some features may not be available.

updateNoticesOptionDescription.message: When StayFocusd updates, a NEW badge is displayed on the StayFocusd icon. Clicking the icon pops open a new window with info about the latest update. This happens very infrequently.

usingWildcardRule3.message: (i.e. *.com blocks all .com sites, or *foo blocks all domains with the word "foo" in them)

visitCustomize3.message: tab for hiding/showing the deactivate switch.

walkthrough_activeDaysAndHours.message: You can configure which days of the week and which hours of the day you want StayFocusd to count down your time for blocked websites.

walkthrough_allowedSites.message:
Add websites or URLs here to prevent them from counting toward your max allowed time and to not block them after you've ran out of time.

For example, if you add youtube.com as a blocked site, you can add any YouTube video URL as an allowed site to watch it after you've ran out of time for the day.

walkthrough_blockedAllSites.message: When enabled, all websites (other than ones listed in your "Allowed Sites") will count toward your max allowed time for the day.

walkthrough_blockedSites.message: This is where you add the websites you want to spend less time on. For each group of websites, you assign a max allowed time per day. When your time runs out for the day, StayFocusd will block you from accessing the websites in that group.

walkthrough_nuclear.message:
The Nuclear Option gives you the ability to immediately block websites without waiting for your time to run out. It's StayFocusd's most extreme method for blocking websites because it can't be turned off.

Use it when you need to really focus and get something done.

walkthrough_nuclearSpecificTime.message: In addition to automatically enabling "The Nuclear Option" sometime in the future, you can also automatically enable it on a repeating schedule.

walkthrough_requireChallenge.message: This prevents you from breaking your own rules. When enabled, you'll have to type a very long paragraph without making a single mistake before changing settings. This prevents you from cheating by, for example, increasing the maximum time allowed, removing blocked sites, or adding new allowed sites.

wantToHelpUsImproveStayFocusd.message: Want to help us improve StayFocusd? Fill out the

wantToTestRequireChallenge.message: Want to test the challenge before you turn it on?

whitelistAddingSiteDescription.message: Add site(s) to allow in the text box below, then click "Add Allowed Site(s)". Some tips:

whitelistAddingSiteRule1.message: To allow multiple sites, add one per line.

whitelistAddingSiteRule2.message: You can use a preceding asterisk as a wildcard (i.e. *.com allows all.com sites, or *foo allows all domains with the word "foo" in them)

wildcardsPathsNotSupported.message: * Usage limits for wildcards and web paths are not supported in Stayfree apps.
